medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reported a 7-hour history of right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain that acutely started at 3 AM. She described the pain as sharp and stabbing. After consuming a piece of toast at 5 AM, the pain persisted and was accompanied by nausea, leading her to seek emergency care. The pain was not preceded by food and she has not experienced similar pain previously.
